name: Adriana::System: Circulatory
description:
README! Developer: https://itch.io/profile/titlechanqwerty Publisher:  https://statteam.itch.io/
------------------------------------------------------ Well. Someone is rioting in purgatory again. So. You can stop this! This Ukraine Shoot em up and arena game. Kill all enemy! Pre-Story -> We all die sooner or later, and when we die, we either go to hell or heaven. But you can also get into Purgatory. This place is very interesting. Like heaven, it has its god. This is a female person who is replaced every 30 years. Purgatory is much more advanced than heaven, hell, and even us. So much so that in this place there is even a syringe that can cure you of all diseases and even revive you. This place has a holy place that looks like a huge citadel. In this place there are people who were created by the goddess Adriana (Name God Purgatory) herself . They follow order, and sometimes ask the gods for money).  By the way. The names of those people are Danna and Apotheosis. -More Info on Documentation in game folder- Story Game -> Lately, strange people have been walking the streets of purgatory, literally collecting their blood and pouring it into a jar. So. You can stop this. Character: QWERTY:  A male person. 14 years old. Main Character in this game. ZERO:  The lost soul of one of Adriana, who sits in the body of QWERTY. Ioann: Work detective in police. Friend QWERTY Anna: Not the last maid in the citadel. Danna: Well, you know. Game Info ->  Support Language: EN(80-85% Correct), UA(99% Correct). Support Input Type: Keyboard. How Control This F Game ->    ---Keyboard---> WASD - move. K - Shoot,  K+J - shoot left. K+L - shoot right.
I -shoot Bomb. ESC - pause. E or Enter - Correct select. Q - back. ---See Tutorial In Game--- More Info -> Support Window Size: 1280x720 window and fullscreen. Support OS: Windows, Linux. Library and language using: Python, pygame. Using Soft and OS: Pycharm community edition, Arch Linux, lmms, audacity, aseprite. Game Mode -> Story Mode - You will get random tasks. Complete them to go further and not die. Record Mode - Collect more score. Music Mode - Playing your personal music(Drop your music in "Personal Music" game folder). Tutorial - see how play. The game has 3 difficulty modes Question -> A: Why i can play this game? TitleChanQWERTY - If you like playing in shoot em up game, and you like arena shooter game, and you like kill any enemy. This game for you! A: What is a "Adriana.System 3"? TitleChanQWERTY - This my old testing game. I wanted to create such a game for a long time, but I didn't think everything through. Well this game started is a new era in adriana::system game. A: Why ENG language is not correct? TitleChanQWERTY - I make this game more for ukraine people. But I want other people to be able to play my game. That's why I added English, which I don't know very well. A: Why game so simple? TitleChanQWERTY - This game i try make how big indie solo project. But i not ready for game this size. A: Why novel section is so simple? TitleChanQWERTY - This my first novel section, and i don't know how make this, and i bad drawing. But i try make novel in game, and i make novel simple. Idea this novel, the try show mind main character. He is see world how black and white A: What is a future? TitleChanQWERTY - In future? In future i can make arkanoid game. Name this game Adriana::System: My mind is F my girlfriend. Well, this not baby game. ---Open Source--- This open-source project. You can find game source on GitLab -> https://gitlab.com/TitleChanQWERTY/adriana-system-circulatory
